Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory673.jpg'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Well done indeed.'}
{3: 'Inside the frigid exhibition hall, "Conductor"—whose body has formed from pieces of mechanoids on the floor—trots up to the train\'s door.'}
{3: 'Almost complete, its body misses just one last piece now.'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: "Sir... with all due respect... you're stepping on my head."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Oops, apologies!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: 'This... is all quite baffling.'}
{3: "Picking up the part from under his foot, Kamui mounts it hard on Conductor's body."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Conductor', 3: 'Thank you so much.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: 'Seems like our missing passengers are now back as well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Where did you go?', 3: '19'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I challenged this guy that I met in an online game to a match, but I ended up standing him up because a mission came up.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'He was totally cool with that, but I felt kind of guilty for standing him up...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "So I decided to show up this time as promised, except he wasn't there...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Conductor', 3: "Gestalt's replay excludes external all entities from outside Babylonia to maximize calculation capacity.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Oh boy, what a shame... Wait, does that mean the guy isn't from Babylonia?", 4: '2'}
{3: "Its face showing not one trace of emotion, the robot looks away without answering Kamui's question."}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: 'The question is not part of the task at hand.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Where are we now anyway?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'So this exhibition hall... is also part of the replay?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: 'Exactly.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Conductor', 3: 'And based on my observation of everything you did just now, I believe these trivialities fail to constitute a compelling reason for this particular historical data to be preserved.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: "What's the point in preserving the initial version of the data when Allen's first application was rejected?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'But Iris Warbler only came into existence because he improved his first application!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: 'Ultimately, however, the final version is the one that was approved, no?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: "In other words—all that's useless, discarded, insignificant, and meaningless shall be removed.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "No, that's definitely not true.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Because nothing is meaningless!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: 'Please, then, prove to me the meaning of your having breakfast together.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Conductor', 3: 'This particular data obviously lacks value.', 4: '1'}
{2: "These things don't need a meaning in the first place, though.", 3: '56'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: 'That which lacks meaning lacks value.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: 'That which lacks a special meaning shall be deleted.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Says Noan as he steps out of the train through the back door, followed by Bianca.'}
{3: 'Seems like this party is about to grow a lot rowdier.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Conductor', 3: 'Objection... you said?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: '...I picked that up from an old detective film.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "But what I am trying to say is that what you said isn't true.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Our experiences make us who we are, whether they're meaningful or not.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Conductor', 3: 'That... is incomprehensible.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'And that... is probably what sets "humans" apart from "programs."', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Conductor', 3: 'Everything is binary and needs to be accurate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Things are never so black-and-white to humans, though.', 3: '81'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: 'Utterly incomprehensible...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Silence befalls the cold, spacious exhibition hall.'}
{2: 'Let us show you, then.', 3: '84'}
{2: 'Let us show you the meaning and value of history.', 3: '85'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: "You're going to... show me?", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Well, chop chop and get the show on the road, then.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'From outside the car, a red figure pulls a window open and stares curiously this way.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What? Surprised to see me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You have to keep roaming around with this machine if you want to prove yourself right.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Hop on already. I'm in a rush to give Noctis a blow in the head now.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Conductor', 3: '...Understood.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: "Per everyone's request, I'll be choosing a different point in time to replay.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: 'I hereby sincerely implore that we prove the value of the upcoming historical data.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: 'Or, for that matter, prove me wrong...', 4: '1'}
